def timefunc(func): 
    def wrapper(*args):
        start = time.time()
	result = func(*args)

        # ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏≤ CSS Class contents ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ driver.find_elements
        contents = driver.find_elements(By.CSS_SELECTOR, ".contents")

        # ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏≤‡∏õ‡∏∏‡πà‡∏° More ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ CSS Class more ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏π‡πà‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô CSS Class contents
        more_button = contents[0].find_elements(By.CSS_SELECTOR, ".more")

        # ‡∏•‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏î‡∏°‡∏≤‡πÅ‡∏•‡πâ‡∏ß ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡∏±‡πà‡∏á‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏î JavaScript ‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô driver.execute_script
        driver.execute_script("document.querySelectorAll('.contents')[0].querySelectorAll('.is-4').forEach(element => element.remove())")

        # ‡∏Å‡∏î‡∏õ‡∏∏‡πà‡∏° More ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡∏±‡πà‡∏á‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏î JavaScript ‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô driver.execute_script
        driver.execute_script("document.querySelectorAll('.contents')[0].querySelector('.more').click()")

        # ‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏à‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏à‡∏∞‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏î‡∏Ç‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏™‡∏£‡πá‡∏à‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ö‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢ ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ EC.visibility_of_all_elements_located
        wait.until(EC.visibility_of_all_elements_located((By.CSS_SELECTOR, ".contents .is-4")))

def pull_data(f, driver, previous_news_count, limit_news = 20):
    # ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ß‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏Ç‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏ô CSS Class is-4 ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏π‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ô CSS Class contents
    contents = driver.find_elements(By.CSS_SELECTOR, ".contents")
    news = contents[0].find_elements(By.CSS_SELECTOR, ".is-4")

    # Status
    print(f"[*] Scraping")

    # ‡∏î‡∏∂‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ß‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏Ç‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏è‡∏ö‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏à
    news_count = len(news)

    # ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Ç‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏î‡∏∂‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô 20 ‡∏Ç‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ß
    limit_news = news_count + previous_news_count - limit_news
    limit_loop = news_count if limit_news <= 0 else news_count - limit_news
    for i in range(limit_loop):
        new = news[i]

        # ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏≤ CSS Class image ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏∂‡∏á‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏û‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏î‡∏´‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏Ç‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ß
        img_path = new.find_element(By.CSS_SELECTOR, ".image img").get_attribute('src')

        # ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏≤ CSS Class topic ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏∂‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏ß‡∏î‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô ‡πÜ
        topic = new.find_element(By.CSS_SELECTOR, ".info .topic").text

        # ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏≤ CSS Class title ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏∂‡∏á‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏î‡∏´‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏Ç‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ß
        title = new.find_element(By.CSS_SELECTOR, ".info .title").text
        
        # ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏≤‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏•‡∏¥‡πâ‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πå‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏π‡πà‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô CSS Class title ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏∂‡∏á‡∏•‡∏¥‡πâ‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πå‡∏Ç‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ß
        url = new.find_element(By.CSS_SELECTOR, ".info .title a").get_attribute('href')

        # ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏≤ CSS Class date ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏∂‡∏á‡∏ß‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏ú‡∏¢‡πÅ‡∏û‡∏£‡πà‡∏Ç‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ß ‡∏£‡πà‡∏ß‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏•‡∏ö‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß comma (,) ‡∏≠‡∏≠‡∏Å
        date = new.find_element(By.CSS_SELECTOR, ".info .writer .date").text
        date = date.replace(',', '')

        # ‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏î‡∏∂‡∏á‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏•‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå CSV
        f.write(f"{ date },{ topic },{ title },{ url },{ img_path }\n")

    return limit_loop
